resources.string: Setting up visualization and monitoring, and analyzing basals and ratios
Verify that BG is available in Nightscout, and pump insulin data is being uploaded

In open loop mode, AnyDANA-Loop will recommend changes to basal delivery to work to keep your blood glucose in range. Once you have enacted 10 temporary basal rates, you can press verify to progress through to the next stage. You should aim to complete stage one and move onto stage two in 1-3 days
Understanding your open loop, including its temp basal recommendations
Based on that experience, decide what max basal should be, and set it on the pump and preferences
Starting to close the loop with Low Glucose Suspend

In Low Glucose Suspend, AnyDANA-Loop will automatically reduce basal insulin delivery if it predicts low glucose. It will not make any corrections for high glucose (you need to correct manually). Spend three days in Low Glucose Suspend. If you have multiple lows during this time, contact your HCP. If you do not have many lows, you can progress to stage 3 after three days.

In stage 3 you are in full automated insulin delivery mode. AnyDANA-Loop will automatically increase or reduce basal insulin delivery to keep you in target range. Your safety settings are currently conservative to minimise risk of hypoglycaemia. You can move to stage 4 in consultation with your HCP at or after your first electronic review.
Adjust basals and ratios if needed, and then enable auto-sens
1 week successful daytime looping with regular carb entry
Enabling additional features for daytime use, such as advanced meal assist
Enabling additional features for daytime use, such as SMB
In stage 4 you have access to the full range of algorithm features to minimise high glucose. Please ensure that you understand the features in stage 4 before making any changes to settings.
Set profile 90% for 10 min (Long-press profile name on Overview)
Simulate shower. Disconnect pump for 1h (Long-press on Open Loop)
... and reconnect back the same way
Create custom temporary target with 10 min duration (Long-press on your current target)
In Config Builder enable Actions plugin, make it visible and display its content from top menu
Use scale function by long-pressing BG chart
